sentences.sContent: Are you doing anything nice this weekend?
sentences.sCn: 这个周末你有什么好的安排？

sentences.sContent: Tony has been unwell over the weekend (= during the weekend ).
sentences.sCn: 托尼这个周末身体不舒服。

sentences.sContent: We’re going to Paris for a long weekend (= Saturday and Sunday, and also Friday or Monday, or both ).
sentences.sCn: 我们要到巴黎去度一个长周末。

synos.tran: 周末，周末休假；周末聚会

phrases.pCn: 在周末；整个周末；经过周末

remMethod.val: week(周)+end(末端)→每周的末端→周末

trans.tranOther: Saturday and Sunday, especially considered as time when you do not work
